mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp_detail(emp_no, id, pwd, bank, addr, addr_detail, account ,postcode) VALUES(#{emp_no}, #{id}, #{pwd}, #{bank}, #{addr}, #{addr_detail}, #{account}, #{postcode})
mapper.select: select emp_no from emp where emp_no=#{emp_no}
select id from emp_detail where emp_no=#{emp_no}
